name: Zombie Compound (itch)
description:
A Rogue-lite, Base Building, Survival Game.

Start with just a pistol. Defeat waves of zombies, acquiring upgrades or building up your defences after each wave.   The game limits the options available to the player forcing them to make value decisions and weigh up opportunity costs. Strategy and planning are required to survive.

Features:

  • More Than 1000 Zombies on Screen at any One Time
  • Top Down Shooting Mechanics
  • RTS Style Base Building
  • Rogue-Lite Mechanics
  • Sand Box Mode for Testing New Strategies
  • A Focus on Decision Making
  •  8 Hours Expected Play Time 

Minimum PC Requirements: Low

  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
